text_block_list.text: The day before the Selection Race was to be held I decided to go for a walk in a nearby park.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Woah woah woah! Move! Move outta the way!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whoo!!
I looked over and saw Tokai Teio running towards me, but at the last second she jumped over me in a beautiful manner. Then…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And safe!! Now then… here's your hat!
It seems like that little girl's hat got stuck up a tree and Tokai Teio went and got it for her…

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Waah! Thank you so much, Miss! That jump was super cool too!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: No no no. Don't call me "Miss" call me the "Unbeatable Teio-sama"♪

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Unbeatable…? I don't really get it, but it sounds cool!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wahahaha!! Feel free to praise me more!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right… Hey you! Sorry for scaring you like that.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I couldn't hit the brakes and ended up jumping over you! You're not hurt anywhere, are you?
choice_data_list: More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…
More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Aha! That was nothing for someone like me! See? I feel perfect!
Even though she jumped so high, Tokai Teio seemed completely fine.
It seems like she's truly blessed with an amazing physique, as evidenced by that amazing leap she had!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Were you surprised? I bet you were! Hehe♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wait, I'm busy right now! I was in the middle of running. So see ya later!
After saying that, Tokai Teio nimbly ran off.
For the rest of the day, I couldn't get her out of my mind. Then came the Selection Race…

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: You're doing great, Teio!! Continue this pace and overtake the rest of 'em!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Tokai Teio is steadily increasing her position! She's pushing gracefully into the lead!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehe… The winner's gonna be me!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Tokai Teio is extending her lead!! No one can catch up with her as she proceeds forward with ease!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's four lengths ahead of 2nd place, and she's the winner!! The winner of this Selection Race is Tokai Teio! This was a beautiful display of her strength!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Phew! Everyone! How'd you like that race!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Teio, you're the best!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: You looked amazing out there!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Aha, thanks! But hey, of course I of all people was able to do it!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Eh? Who're… Ah! You were at the park yesterday! Hmm… why're you here?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ah, I get it! You're a trainer, aren't you!? Now that I take a closer look, you've got a badge and everything!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So the reason you're coming to talk to me is… You're trying to scout me, aren't you!?
choice_data_list: I'd love to be your trainer!
I'd love to be your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, what should I do? The thing is, even before this race a lot of trainers reached out to me.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ah! There she is, Tokai Teio!! Your racing ability was truly spectacular! Please allow me to scout you!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Teio, join me! I'm sure that if we work together you'll not only be able to win GI races, but also the Triple Crown!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh no, they keep increasing!! Umm, if this many people approach me I won't be able to decide…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Well regardless of who I choose, I'll be the one running so nothing's really gonna change.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Guess whoever beats me at rock-paper-scissors gets to be my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Come on now, Teio. An Uma Musume and her trainer must work together in perfect harmony…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahh, Prez!! Preeezz!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You came to watch my race, didn't you!? Hehehe, how did I do!? I won again ya know?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haa… Yes, I did come to watch. You did amazingly, as usual.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yaay!! Ehehe, Prez praised me♪ Everyone, did you hear that!?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah, yeah… But more importantly than that, I would like to…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: What did you just say!? What do you mean by "that!?" Hey you, do you not understand just how amazing Prez really is!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She's the president of Tracen Academy, you know!? She's also super fast, super strong, and super cool! She's the greatest Uma Musume in the world, and my idol!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: One day I'm gonna be as great as her, then she'll praise me a whole bunch♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And that means that if you really wanna scout me, you've gotta truly understand just how great Prez is!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Speaking of… Did you all see her debut race!? Prez was so amazing, starting from the first corner she…!
All of the trainers that came to speak with Tokai Teio ended up getting lectured on the legendary history of "Prez…"
In the end, no one was able to talk to her about scouting…
